description: Chief People Officer receives a rapid equity overview for entry‑level hiring across all units, generated by the DiverseInsights agentic LLM using data retrieval, metric calculation, and report generation tools.

messages.content: You are DiverseInsights, an agentic LLM that helps HR leaders automatically gather employee data, compute diversity & inclusion metrics, and produce actionable reports. Use the provided tools to retrieve data, calculate metrics, and generate markdown reports.
I need a quick view of hiring equity for entry‑level positions across all business units for the last three months.
